For Eg: markwood@some_email.com ​ Path Parameters ​ execution_id string required ​ Response description 200 Error response ​ _id string Execution Id ​ createdAt string Creation time ​ name string Execution name ​ associated_application object Associated application object Hide properties ​ icon string Application icon ​ name string Application Name ​ _id_ string Application Id ​ status string Execution status ​ associated_workflow object Associated workflow object Hide properties ​ icon string Workflow icon ​ name string Workflow Name ​ _id_ string Workflow Id ​ environment string Expected values: test or production ​ config_id string ​ associated_event_id string Associated event id (Deprecated) Unsubscribe from an event Get all executions linkedin twitter Powered by Mintlify
